name: Gladihaters (itch)
description:
Descriction:

You grew up believing humans were on the top of the food chain.
Just one more lie they fed you. "They", the true forces that run the world, the monsters that dominate our cruel society, the creatures of the dark who rule the world from the shadows without even showing their faces...
The supernatural creatures, vampires, werewolves, goblins, witches, ghosts...
They are all real...
But that is another story - this story is different, it's a fun story, a story about entertainment...
This is the story of the modern gladiators, prisoners sentenced to the death row, secretly put asleep only to be awakened in their worst nightmare: a series of fights against deadly monsters only to please the crowd... if you ever thought that the death sentence was too light for a murderer or rapist , this is the punishment they truly deserve: to be thrown to the beasts to be savagely slaughtered without any mercy.
You are the Warden of a prison in texas, you have with you a "team" of scum of the earth to be slaughtered, your job - to make it entertaining.
Now you'll face the first challenge of tonight’s games, please choose who you'll throw to the beasts - and remember - keep the crowd entertained!

Instructions:

Use the mouse to select the prisioner who is going to entertain you for the night
While in combat, click on the buttons on the lower screen in order to give instuctions to the prisioner

Button - Function
1st - Attack
2nd - Defend
3rd - Stronger Attack
4th - Taunt (Gain more points)
5th - Stop the Prisioner

The Final Score you get is determined by how many of these actions you use for the duration of the battle;

Created by Chaos.
